channel.title: Help! need help! with moparscape
channel.description:
IF YOU REPLY TO THIS PLEASE VIVID INSTRUCTIONS
Ok i got mopar scape. This is what i do start new server well i do server ip 0.0.0.0 and port 43954 (something like that) LOGS ME ON PERFECTLEY
i can not figure out somethings :confused: :confused: :confused: 1: im trying to edit the objects in the level well when i try to do that, i got to autospwan right?
it says it is a cfg file i cant open it it brings me to a site that doesnt even have it too!
2: i noticed while looking at moporscape under help there is the ids for objects, items, and npcs i know objects is
::object ???
npcs
::npc ???
Well what i dont understand is what is objects??? SERIOUSLLY
third, Im trying to set up a shop and other things like that... well how? i cant figure alot of coding please
lastly, how do i set up furnaces anvills trees, etc? :eek:
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2007, 09:18:41 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE NEED HELP[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2007, 09:19:11 PM[/size][hr]oh yea i tried using my ip adress and i cant get my friend on :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2007, 09:21:47 PM[/size][hr]please i think moparscape is great (although it should have some of the latest rs updates like clan chat AND graphics
even friend list updates +skills
but still i wanna play so bad
i really need help with this so please help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2007, 09:29:34 PM[/size][hr]UGH HELP!

item.title: Help! need help! with moparscape

item.description:
@wood_zapper wrote:

thanks for all the help peoples!

Read full topic

item.title: Help! need help! with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @darkstar447 darkstar447
item.description:
@darkstar447 wrote:

seriously dude first read the guide on how to make ur own server and dont just start posting pointless threads . i could hardly understand wat u were sayin its not hard wen u actually think and not just click around were ever and hope sompn happns and since ur friend cant get on im guessing u dont even have a clue about getting ur on no-ip and portforwarding so read guides and learn java a lil bit more and wen u have done trial and error and cant get an answer then post in good detail.

AND MAKE IT MAKE SENCE!

Read full topic

item.title: Help! need help! with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

or learn to even work a moparscape server by logging in and moving around first then learing to use commands then start learning other things…

item.title: Help! need help! with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

Honestly, It doesnt sound like you know much about Java, if you want to make your own server, i’d get to know more about Java first.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! need help! with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Whats it called if you post 5 times in a row? it goes quadruple then wut? o well dont do that anyway…and to make your own server its like a big guide you gotta follow

Read full topic

item.title: Help! need help! with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

It isn’t just push the button and start new server. It’s quite a lot of work to make everything your own and working. I recomment to you to download a server source e.g. testscape, cheezscape (see toturial page) and start edditing the files.

You can open cfg files with notepad.

an object is an item like a borrel or box, an npc is a monster or ‘computer person’.

Also see the toturial section how to make your own shop, I tought zezimaisme111 made a really good oen about it.

Read full topic

IF YOU REPLY TO THIS PLEASE VIVID INSTRUCTIONS

Ok i got mopar scape. This is what i do

LOGS ME ON PERFECTLEY

i cant open it it brings me to a site that doesnt even have it too!

i know objects is

Well what i dont understand is what is objects???
SERIOUSLLY

Im trying to set up a shop and other things like that… well how?
i cant figure alot of coding please
